EmailTemplate.description: This email template is used to Notify Vineti To Reschedule Order for new Apheresis Pickup Date
EmailTemplate.name: Notify Vineti To Reschedule Order Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Order {!Order__c.CartOrderId__c} to be rescheduled for new Apheresis Pickup Date
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear V2V Manager,
A reschedule request has been received for Order with new Apheresis pickup date: Date.
Request you to update the order details in Vineti. Order
Regards, CCM Operations Coordinator
